title: Mobile Microlearning Instructional Design for Strengthening Intergenerational Collaboration Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Mobile Learning Environment Using Smartphones, Emphasizing Collaborative Learning Based on Constructivism and Connectivism

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three intergenerational communication barriers and propose resolution strategies
Learners can design intergenerational knowledge-sharing scenarios using collaborative learning tools
Learners can improve communication strategies at least twice by incorporating formative assessment feedback in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
